overview: Race Queen Reiko Kageyama may refer to:  Even today, he showed off his proud body to the men who crowded the race track.  It was Reiko who responded to the flash that never stopped with various poses,  The scorching sunlight and exhaust-laden air cause you to collapse on the asphalt.  Before she knew it, Reiko was being held captive by a man she didn't know.  Moreover, the man, who claimed to be a fan, was insulting her unconscious at will.  Reiko's gears are starting to go crazy.  in the car by the manager who rescued her,  Raped by a father who attempted suicide in an abandoned forest,  Eventually, he is picked up by a man who lives away from the mundane world,  The man was a crazy scientist who had an unusual obsession with race queens and was trying to create an ideal goddess on the operating table...  What is the end of the longing race queen who receives the desires of all men at once?
title: Mechanical Race Queen
